description: About SANOXYSANOXY offers variety of consumer technology solutions such as cables and adapters, computer networking devices, Presenters and Touch Screen Smart Phone Accessories, Bluetooth Devices as well as Stylus Pens. SANOXY is trademarked brand. Exclusively marketed by authorized resellers on amazon.com. Be sure to find the logo on both product and package to ensure product warranty by SANOXY Specification SANOXY Bluetooth Keyboard is slim and neat. Also use it with your PC, notebook as long as they have bluetooth function; The Bluetooth keyboard with a full-size which includes special keys that activate iPad features; Features 78 keys for functional. On/Off switch; "CONNECT" button; The attached keyboard features a sleek thin enclosure with ow-profile keys that provide a crisp, responsive feel and an ultra compact design that fits on even the most crowded desk; Special keys provide one-touch access to a variety of iPad features: the home screen, spotlight search, display brightness, picture frame mode, the on screen keyboard and screen lock.Note: Keyboard ONLY, iPad not included. Compatible but not endorsed by Apple, Inc.
title: SANOXY Bluetooth Keyboard for iPad
